description:
Jim Carrey with David Icke. For those that weren't sure about the Illuminati stunt on Kimmel.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eG9i7d8yfKQ (Jim Carrey's secret hand signal)

People claimed he was mocking the whole conspiracy movement...but imo he knows exactly what he was doing. 
He was able to bring up the thing and have plausible deniability by being able to claim he was obviously joking.
